mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.project_id, p.name as project_name, t.assigned_to, cs.name as assigner, t.due_date, t.status, t.created_at FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN students cs ON cs.id = t.assigned_to LEFT JOIN projects p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE t.project_id=#{id} ORDER BY t.created_at
select t.id, t.project_id, t.name, t.description, t.assigned_to, t.due_date, t.status, tm.role, t.created_at from tasks t join task_members tm on t.id = tm.task_id where t.id = #{id}
select tm.role, tm.student_id as id, s.name from task_members tm join tasks t on tm.task_id = t.id join students s on tm.student_id = s.id where t.id = #{id}
